translations: n.脾气坏的人，乖戾的人；吝啬鬼；存心不良的人

phrs.translation: 脾气暴躁之人, 存心不良的人, 乖戾的人, 脾气坏的人

sentences.sentence: Indeed, whereas a young curmudgeon has no heart, an old idealist has no head.
sentences.translation: 的确，一个年轻的乖戾之人没有善心，一个年老的理想主义者没有头脑。

sentences.sentence: The old curmudgeon was talking about the smothering effects of parental duty on creative lives.
sentences.translation: 那些坏脾气的老人们喋喋不休于父母生儿育女之责任的妨碍性效应。

sentences.sentence: Only a curmudgeon would deny the many benefits that our computers and electronic networks have brought us.
sentences.translation: 只有一个被我们称为脾气暴躁的老头置疑了电脑、手机带给我们的好处。
